ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
After all the members of the team meet, Sideway Bob discovers that the financier of the attack is not the I.O. but the ancient members of the I.O.
After investigation he finds the track of Ivana, and DV8 leaves helping her. Once their successful mission, they discover that the person in the head of this attack is other one than the senator Killory.
ComicInfo.Title: In Service To Nothing
